briefings.title: Menstrual Phase (Days 1-5)
briefings.summary: Your skin is more sensitive right now. Focus on gentle, hydrating care and barrier support.
tips: Prioritize barrier repair with gentle, hydrating products
Use calming ingredients like ceramides and niacinamide

briefings.title: Follicular Phase (Days 6-13)
briefings.summary: Your skin is resilient and glowing! This is the perfect time for intensive treatments and trying new products.
tips: Perfect time for intensive treatments and peels
Try new products or increase active concentration
Maximize use of exfoliants and retinoids
Skin has optimal absorption and resilience

briefings.title: Ovulation Phase (Days 14-16)
briefings.summary: Your skin looks its best! Maintain your routine and enjoy your natural glow.
tips: Skin is at peak radiance and firmness
Great time for photos and events

briefings.title: Luteal Phase (Days 17-28)
briefings.summary: Oil production increases and breakouts may appear. Focus on balancing and oil control.
tips: Add clay masks to control shine
Limit harsh actives to avoid irritation
